scenarios.name: Brazil Arabica Supply Disruption
scenarios.description: Unexpected frost or drought in Minas Gerais and São Paulo coffee regions triggers a sharp rally in KC futures as traders price in crop damage to the world's largest Arabica producer.

scenarios.name: Global Risk-Off Demand Destruction
scenarios.description: Escalating trade war tariffs and a stronger USD weigh on commodity demand broadly, pushing KC prices lower as roasters reduce forward purchasing and speculative longs unwind.

scenarios.name: Monitoring System Degradation & Forced Liquidation
scenarios.description: Stale drawdown checks (139min) and orchestrator connectivity gaps create a blind spot where an adverse intraday KC move goes unhedged, forcing a disorderly exit at unfavorable prices.
